summary: Chlamydophila pneumoniae (CP) and mycoplasma pneumoniae (MP) patients could require intensive care unit admission for acute respiratory failure. patients with MP were compared to Streptococcus pneumoniae (SP) pneumonia patients admitted to ICUs. additional files 13613_2018_429_MOESM1_ESM.docx (25KB, docx) Additional file 1: Figure S1.
